purpose: Facilitates the development of applications using large language models in a structured and pythonic manner.
principle: Builds on Python and integrates with popular LLMs like GPT-4 to automate language processing tasks.
reusability: Offers modular components that can be reused for various language processing tasks; supports integration with different LLMs.
limitations: May have limited support for non-Python environments; primarily focused on LLM-based applications.
name: promptulate

highlight: Lightweight framework for developing autonomous language agents with a focus on LLM automation.
